text: hyE#tA-vuqrvaSya#syAqyu-raqsItyA#ha mithunaqtvAya# GRuqtEnAqktE vRuSha#NaM dadhAthAqmityA#haq vRuSha#Naq(gg)q hyE#tE dadhA#tEq yE aqgniM gA#yaqtraM CandO&nuq pra jA#yaqsvEtyA#haq CandO#BirEqvainaqM pra ja#nayatyaqgnayE# maqthyamA#nAqyAnu# brUqhItyA#ha sAviqtrImRucaqmanvA#ha saviqtRupra#sUta Eqvaina#M manthati jAqtAyAnu# brUhi- [  ] 30
